org.dotplot.image
Interface ImageCallback

interface ImageCallback

ImageCallback links the image calculation engine(s) to the target image. This way it is possible to exchange the format (class type) of the target without changing the underlying algorithm.

Author:
Tobias Gesellchen

              int y,

Link to the image to be filled.

rgb - Pixel value (Color)

updateProgress

void updateProgress(int diff,
                    int curStep,
                    java.lang.String msg)
Update the progress bar (if existing) with given values.

Parameters:
diff - Progress (in percent) since last update
curStep - Step index, with one of org.dotplot.IDotplot.STEPS
msg - Log message, can be null
See Also:
IDotplot.STEPS
